Jason K. Brown , 29 , of Augusta and formerly of Waterville , was charged by indictment Friday with attempted murder , two counts of arson and one count of aggravated criminal mischief .
The attempted murder and arson charges each carry maximum penalties of 30 years in prison .
The attempted murder count alleges that Brown took a substantial step toward commission of trying to cause the death of James W. McKenna Jr .
